parameters.name: FileSystemId
parameters.description: The ID of the file system.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The page number.

Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page. Default value: 10.

Valid values: 1 to 100.

parameters.name: Path
parameters.description:
The absolute path of a directory.

If you do not specify this parameter, all directories for which quotas are created are returned.
